events.name: Lithium-Ion Recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: Pyrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: Hydrometallurgy
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: Bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: Policy recommendations
events.wd_description: Providing policy recommendations to improve the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain based on the study's findings.
events.description: Providing policy recommendations to improve the sustainability of the lithium-ion battery supply chain based on the study's findings.

events.name: ulatory suggestions
events.wd_description: Developing regulatory suggestions to address the identified barriers and improve sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Developing regulatory suggestions to address the identified barriers and improve sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: ategic initiatives
events.wd_description: Formulating strategic initiatives to enhance sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.
events.description: Formulating strategic initiatives to enhance sustainability in the lithium-ion battery supply chain.

events.name: Leveraging existing sustainability standards
events.description: Recommendations to use and evaluate compliance with existing sustainability standards as a feasible approach to address the complexity of sustainability aspects in the LIBSC
